alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; James City; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 4:46PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Bertie, Northampton, Hertford, northwestern Gates, western Isle of Wight, Southampton, eastern Sussex, southeastern James City and Surry Counties, the City of Franklin and the southwestern City of Suffolk through 530 PM EST... At 444 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong shower, with isolated thunderstorms, along a line extending from Homeville to 7 miles northwest of Rich Square. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Homeville around 450 PM EST. Waverly around 505 PM EST. Wakefield and Conway around 510 PM EST. Dendron around 520 PM EST. Murfreesboro, Chowan University and Elberon around 525 PM EST. Surry, Como and Scotland around 530 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Eagletown, Vicksville, Milwaukee, Tunis, Pons, Kelford, Earleys, Chippokes State Park, Menola and Chowan Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Isle of Wight; James City; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex
